meanings.definition: The quality or state of being craven or cowardly.
meanings.sent1: His cravennesses were evident when he refused to confront his fears.
meanings.sent2: The cravennesses of the soldier were exposed during the battle.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cravennesses, he managed to muster up the courage to face the challenge.
meanings.sent4: The dark forest whispered tales of cravennesses to those who dared to enter.
meanings.sent5: The cravennesses lurking within him paralyzed his every move.

meanings.definition: An act or instance of showing cowardice or fear.
meanings.sent1: Her cravennesses were on full display when she ran away from the spider.
meanings.sent2: The cravennesses of the bully were evident when he picked on those weaker than him.
meanings.sent3: The cat's cravennesses towards the vacuum cleaner never failed to entertain the family.
meanings.sent4: The cravennesses of the storm clouds warned of the impending thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The cravennesses in his eyes betrayed his tough exterior.
